title: Couple of bugs this patch I think
body:
-Enemy jungler's CS keeps jumping up and down in the TAB scoreboard

-There is a minion in the first wave of midlane that just keeps attacking your champion regardless of whether or not you've aggro'd the enemy mid laner and it chases you around and literally doesn't stop until it dies.

The minion one isn't so consistent but it's happened to me a couple of times and it was happening to Bjerg in a couple of games on his stream
